original_text: They said to each other, ‘When he talked to us, it was like a fire that was burning inside us. We felt it while we were walking along the road. We also felt it when he was explaining God's message in the Bible.’
korean_text: 그들이 서로 말하되 길에서 우리에게 말씀하시고 우리에게 성경을 풀어 주실 때에 우리 속에서 마음이 뜨겁지 아니하더냐 하고

sentences.original_text: it was like a fire that was burning inside us
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 우리 안에서 타오르는 불 같았다

sentences.original_text: We felt it while we were walking along the road
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 길을 걷는 동안 그것을 느꼈다

sentences.original_text: We also felt it when he was explaining God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하나님의 메시지를 설명할 때 우리 역시 그것을 느꼈다
